name: Detecting Media Mind Control
description: Uncovering the psychological manipulation tactics embedded in news, entertainment, and digital media.

cards.title: Understanding Psychological Priming in News
cards.description: Breaking down how language, repetition, and selective framing shape public perception.
bulletpoints: Analyzing how fear-driven narratives create compliance and submission.
Identifying patterns of agenda-driven news coverage.
Tracing corporate and governmental influence over media conglomerates.
cards.summaryText: Dissect fear-based priming, chart agenda coverage cycles, and follow ownership influence lines.

cards.title: Symbolism and Predictive Programming in Entertainment
cards.description: Recognizing how future events are preconditioned through pop culture.
bulletpoints: Decoding occult and esoteric symbolism in films, music, and advertising.
Understanding the role of controlled entertainment figures in social engineering.
Identifying how predictive programming is used to normalize extreme events.
cards.summaryText: Decode occult cues, profile controlled icons, and flag predictive scripts normalizing shocks.

cards.title: The Weaponization of Social Media Algorithms
cards.description: Exposing how AI and engagement-driven content reinforce ideological control.
bulletpoints: Recognizing shadow banning, algorithmic bias, and echo chambers.
Tracing how narratives are artificially boosted or suppressed.
Techniques to break free from social media conditioning.
cards.summaryText: Spot algorithmic throttling, track boosted narratives, and practice deconditioning tactics.
